chat.msg: hey, estas listo?
yes
awesome! i'm at the starting point
to my left there's a twig leading to an island with a tiger. where should i head to first?
head to twig
alright! i'm now on the island with the tiger
¿Adónde vamos ahora?
head to the left to parrot
gotcha, i'm now at the big island with the parroten sitting on a tree
what's next?
go to the bottom right on the rocks
okay, arrived at the island with the frog and the crocodile
¿A dónde me dirijo ahora?
go to the crocodile and then go to the giraffe
passed the croc, now with the giraffe
where to?
go to the twig in the bottom to snake and you will reach
done, i see the snake. just a couple more steps and
voila! i found the treasure. *finished*
hola, q tal? ready to go?
I am at the dog
awesome! move a bit west, towards the wooden bench. but don't sit! you'll see a trail
Crúzalo hacia el puesto de floristería, pero en lugar de llegar al puesto, haz un rápido giro en U hacia la izquierda y vuelve a pasar el banco de madera. volvemos con nuestro amigo peludo
ok here with other dog
good job! now, let's head south, pass by the dog towards the checkered picnic spot
can you see it?
yes I am with the dog
great! now, walk over the mat and don't forget to grab some berries from the bowl
continuar hacia el oeste. ¿listo?
ok
perfect, up next is a wooden branch
it helps us cross the river towards the north. let's go!
but I was just there
¡Ah, interesante, vamos a darle vida! ¡Solo evita el arbusto verde y haz un círculo desde la derecha esta vez y dirígete al puesto de floristería!
t the flower shop
great job! now turn left, go under the stand and head towards that big bridge with bikers, cool, right?
ok past the bikers
awesome! see those two elderly folks enjoying their paper? let's head their way
at the elderly people
cool! now just slide a bit south between outside friends and that wooden branch
¡ya casi has llegado!
what wooden bench i am with the old people?
oops! my bad, buddy
i mean, move a bit south from them, ok? you'll reach a nice green bush by the end of the wooden branch there
ok hwere
fantástico! ahora solo sigue el camino hacia el este, entre la rama de madera y el arbusto
sigue adelante!
ok do i go on the wooden branch?
no, no, you're good! stay between the branch and the bush
keep heading east!
ok now what I see deer
¡Ese es nuestro chico! ¡Lo lograste, choca esos cinco!
hola, q tal? ready to start?
alright go down to the dog
got it, i'm standing next to the dog now
¿que sigue?
now go east to the car
done, at the blue car now
where to next?
now go south to the telescope
alright, i'm at the telescope now
¿ahora que?
now go up the rocks and touch the house
ok, i've reached the house
*finished* was that the correct path?
hi there! que comience el juego!!
ok I am at the top right
fantastic! now, head towards the first palm tree you see to your south-west
luego, haga un giro cerrado a la derecha pasando el segundo árbol, y otro giro cerrado a la izquierda antes del tercero que continúa hacia el sur. ¡Mantenlo lento y constante!
I am at the palm tree now where
great work! now, keep going south but make sure to sidestep to the left of a little brown pup
after that, make a small left and then turn right to carry on south. you're doing splendidly!
where is the end goal
no spoilers! just follow my instructions, okay? next, there's a big rock and a small rock
camine recto entre ellos, hacia el agua. ¡Lo estás haciendo genial!
ok I amb etween the big an small rock
awesome! now, step into the water
you'll spot a large red crab, turn right at that spot and continue along the big rock, towards the west. enjoy the splash!
I ma at the shark
woah, shark alert! make a sharp right turn around our finned friend
¡adelante!
at volley ball
amazing! move on through between the medium rock and the vibrant volleyball, then steer your way northwards
keep going, you're nailing it!
I am at the tent
cool! now, head slightly northwest between that funky red tent and the big speaker
¡ya casi estás ahí!
yes at speaker
top job! now circle around the tent in an arc and head south
don't stop yet, you're doing great!
at the row boat
awesome! now turn right and go below that red kayak
¡Cuidado con tus pasos, amigo!
I am at the rock below kayak
roger that! now, turn sharp right and go straight along the kayak until you see a small green bush
